title: New: Jamie XX – I Know There’s Gonna Be (Good Times)
content:
With his debut solo album out in just under two weeks, Jamie XX has shared another cut lifted from the release, in the form of the Young Thug and Popcaan featuring, I Know There’s Gonna Be (Good Times).

Arguably the album highlight, it’s a side to Jamie XX that we haven’t seen before, almost feels like it could have found a place on Nelly’s  2004 album Sweat/Suit, or K’naan’s The Dusty Foot on the Road. Song of the summer? Quite possibly. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
